title: Security operations centers: a first principle idea. [CSO Perspectives]
description: The idea of operations centers has been around as far back as 5,000 B.C. This show covers the history of how we got from general purpose operations centers to the security operations centers today, the limitations of those centers, and what we need to do as a community make them more useful in our infosec program.

itunes:author: CyberWire, Inc.
